# BioDocs.ai - AI-Powered Biomedical Research Platform

> Transform your biomedical research with AI

## About BioDocs.ai

BioDocs.ai is an AI-powered platform designed for biomedical researchers, healthcare professionals, medical students, and academic writers. We provide intelligent tools to accelerate research, writing, and collaboration.

Website: https://www.biodocs.ai
Contact: support@biodocs.ai

## Core Features

### 1. AI Research Assistant
Intelligent chat interface for research queries, document analysis, and literature exploration. Powered by advanced language models trained on biomedical literature.

### 2. Presentation Builder
Generate professional medical and scientific presentations with AI. Create slides for grand rounds, conferences, lectures, and CME sessions.

### 3. Research Paper Writer
AI-assisted academic paper writing with automatic citations, proper formatting, and structure guidance for journals and conferences.

### 4. Citation Generator
Access to 280M+ academic sources including PubMed, arXiv, and major journals. Automatic citation formatting in APA, MLA, Chicago, Vancouver, and more.

### 5. AI Document Editor
Advanced document editing with:
- AI-powered paraphrasing
- Smart autocomplete
- Grammar and style suggestions
- Medical terminology assistance

### 6. Deep Research
Comprehensive literature review and research synthesis from PubMed, arXiv, and other academic databases.

### 7. Literature Review Generator
Automated synthesis of research literature with proper citations and thematic organization.

### 8. Manuscript Review
AI-powered peer review simulation and feedback for manuscripts before submission.

### 9. Personal Statement Builder
Craft compelling personal statements for medical residency, fellowship, and graduate school applications.

### 10. E-Poster Builder
Transform research abstracts into conference-ready electronic posters with professional layouts.

### 11. IRB Builder
Generate draft IRB (Institutional Review Board) and ethics protocols for research studies.

### 12. Chat with Documents
Upload PDFs and interact with them using AI. Extract insights, summarize content, and ask questions about your documents.

### 13. Video Meetings
HIPAA-ready video conferencing for:
- Telemedicine consultations
- Grand rounds presentations
- CME sessions
- Research collaborations
- Tele-proctoring

### 14. File Manager
Secure document storage and organization for all your research materials.

## Use Cases

### Medical Professionals
- Create presentations for grand rounds and conferences
- Generate patient education materials
- Conduct literature reviews for clinical decisions
- Collaborate with colleagues via secure video

### Researchers
- Write and format research papers
- Find and manage citations
- Conduct systematic literature reviews
- Prepare IRB protocols

### Medical Students
- Study with AI-powered document analysis
- Create presentations for rotations
- Write personal statements for residency
- Prepare for board exams

### Academic Writers
- Paraphrase and improve writing
- Generate citations automatically
- Review manuscripts before submission
- Create conference posters

## Data & Privacy

- HIPAA-ready infrastructure for healthcare data
- SOC 2 compliant cloud hosting
- End-to-end encryption
- GDPR and CCPA compliant
- No selling of user data

Privacy Policy: https://www.biodocs.ai/privacy
Terms of Service: https://www.biodocs.ai/terms

## Technical Information

- Built with Next.js and React
- Server-side rendering for SEO
- AI powered by OpenAI, Google AI, and Cerebras
- Real-time collaboration features
- Mobile-responsive design

## Pricing

- Free tier available with usage limits
- Premium plans for individuals and teams
- Enterprise solutions for institutions

## Contact

- Website: https://www.biodocs.ai
- Support: support@biodocs.ai
- Privacy: privacy@biodocs.ai
- Legal: legal@biodocs.ai
